reviewText:
Everyone needs to see this video series!!  It is Most Excellent!  I have bought it twice now b/c I gave my first set to the Pastor at a church I visited.  I hope to share this set with someone else and buy my third set!!
Frank Turek is a Wonderful teacher!!
He is easy to follow and understand.
After seeing this video for the first time, I downloaded his app on my phone and listen to his live radio programs every chance I get.
Highly Recommended!!

Excellent book

Very easy to go through

Highly informative; logical and intellectually satisfying

Highly recommend it
